short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display IMDb, Rotten Tomatoes and Metacritic scores on Netflix, Prime, Disney+ and other streaming sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Seamlessly integrates IMDb, Rotten Tomatoes and Metacritic review scores onto Netflix, Disney+, Streamz and Prime Video, providing instant access to ratings for movies and TV shows.

This extension is a work in progress. If you have any ideas for features, feel free to contact me.
